## WorkspaceSvg.setNavigator() method

Sets the Navigator instance used by this workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setNavigator(newNavigator: Navigator): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newNavigator | [Navigator](./blockly.navigator_class.md) | A Navigator object to coordinate movement between elements on the workspace. |

**Returns:**

void
